tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DrugResistanceTrends (
    pathogen_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pathogen_name VARCHAR(255),
    genetic_profile JSONB,
    last_observation_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE pathogens (pathogen_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, genetic_profile JSONB)
CREATE TABLE drug_resistance (resistance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, pathogen_id INT REFERENCES pathogens(pathogen_id), drug_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, resistance_level VARCHAR(20))
CREATE TABLE resistance_trends (trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY, resistance_id INT REFERENCES drug_resistance(resistance_id), trend_date TIMESTAMP, trend_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE DrugResistance (id INT PRIMARY KEY, pathogen_id INT, test_date DATE, drug_resistance_percentage DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Pathogen (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), species VARCHAR(255), genetic_profile TEXT);
CREATE TABLE PathogenResistanceProfile (id INT PRIMARY KEY, profile_id INT, gene_name VARCHAR(255), mutation VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE PatientPathogenMap (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, pathogen_id INT, test_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE pathogen (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), genetic_profile TEXT)
CREATE TABLE drug (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), target VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE resistance_profile (id INT PRIMARY KEY, pathogen_id INT, drug_id INT, resistance_level VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE sample (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_date DATE, pathogen_id INT, lab_id INT)
CREATE TABLE lab (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255)
